Articles.Content:
I'd launch a counter probe aircraft with homing missiles and emergency kamikaze mode.

I'd travel back in time and kill my grandpa in an impenetrable suit of armour with weapons integrated.
I use a TARDIS to change the universe I'm in but the next poster, is not so lucky.
I slam the Titanic into your TARDIS before scurrying off using the infinite improbability drive.
The Heart Of Gold, the next poster, and his planet randomly turn into fruitcake, and my TARDIS is put into a protective bubble.

wat.

The next poster will be subjected to how Cleverbot treats Jacksepticeye.

My knowledge of The Hitchhiker's guide to the galexy protects me.

At an improgigility of 78243596712435698 to 1 the next user becomes Jacksepticeye. (just see him post next:cool:)

I am Jacksepticeye not, so that doesn't apply.

The next user is GLaDOS.
I'd like to do some experiments on the next poster.

good to know that your going to delete caroline and set me free

I'd use a portal gun to shoot a portal at the ceiling and one directly on the ground below it and push the next poster into it

But then I hide in the soup that you told me get out of

I throw the soup bowl at the next poster.

I duck.

The next poster doesn't.
It overshoots, heading toward the next poster.

I go up on a rocket and nuke it from orbit.

The next poster is right next to that nuke...

*quickly smears the thick soup all over skin* your radiation can't harm me now!

i scrape a slimy, now syphilis infected soup residue of my genetalia and sling it in the general direction of the next poster

Edited August 20, 2014 by Belphegor
I shoot it down with an orbital pillow cannon. I also launch a Homing Comfy Chair at the next poster.
You ignored the net, so it bounces the chair back to the previous poster, and (after taking the poster with it) go to the next poster.
It lands in my incinerator. I throw the next poster into said incinerator.
What if the me in this hypothetical situation survived?

You would be in a lot of pain right now.

I fire a 50 ton rocket from ksc2 to ksc!

I use a spaceplane with missiles attached to shoot it down in midair.

I blow up a nuke in the core of Kerbin, killing everyone around it except me (I'm on Duna).

Well, I'm on an interstellar voyage in the hunt for this "Earth" everyone is talking about.

I'm flying so fast that unfortunately I hit the next poster with my shield. While on Hyperdrive. At 0.8c. (ie: that hurts a lot, and you're vaporized into a giant ball of plasma)

Sorry, what? I can't hear you over these explosions. I'm over a billion kilometers away, I whupped on the hyperdrive throttle soon as I posted that.

I sneak into an asteroid field, turn on my cloak, and blast the next poster out of spacetime.
unfortunately whatever you blasted me with missed and hit an asteroid next to the following poster, with devastating results.

I protect myself with a force field.

North Korea's military is crap, so it has no effect.

I clone Jebediah and send them, with boosterz, to the next poster.
